caller_intent: The caller (Peggy from Brighton Sons) appears to be attempting to reach someone named Gloria, possibly to follow up on an email request for a certificate and coordinate next steps.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledged Peggy's request to reach Gloria.
Agent offered to transfer the call to Gloria's extension.
Agent mentioned sending an email request for the certificate to ensure Gloria is aware of the pending action.
knowledge_required: Email handling procedures for certificate requests
summary: An inbound call from Peggy at Brighton Sons involved attempting to reach Gloria for follow-up on an email request for a certificate. The agent offered to transfer the call and mentioned sending an email to ensure coordination. The call did not resolve the issue but set up potential follow-up actions.
